title: Afghanistan Paghman-mura no Monogatari: Sekaiichi Utsukushii Boku no Mura
original_name: アフガニスタン・パグマン村の物語 せかいいち　うつくしい　ぼくの村
sinopse: An educational film about Paghman, Afghanistan showing the simple life and beauty of the region and its regular citizens to juxtapose the War in Afghanistan that stared in real life the year prior.
